articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Isro to launch Europe's Proba-3 mission on PSLV, show formation flying in space - India Today
articles.description: The launch vehicle of choice for this mission is the reliable PSLV-XL rocket, operated by the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO).
articles.content:
India will launch the European Space Agency's (ESA) pioneering Proba-3 mission in September 2024. 
This ambitious project marks the world's first precision formation flying mission, with a pair of s… [+1742 chars]
